snippet.title: Volseons: Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
First look at our gameplay trailer.

Volseons is an upcoming RPG set in a medieval world where monsters are captured and used to rage war between opposing factions.
_______________________________________

_______________________________________

ABOUT VOLSEONS:

Welcome to Dynanzium!
You are diving in a medieval setup where terrible monsters are living along humans. While many would say humans should be scared of monsters, in this setup, humans enslaved the beasts in order to use them in their service.
Challenge, capture and train a multitude of monsters, unlocking their potential and taking on even more terrifying foes.
Get immersed into an intricate story of betrayal, vengeance and redemption!
